=== Dependents/Clients ===

* Unity

=== Test Plan ===

* Install latest (trusty-proposed) image on desktop
* Install freshly build MPs that are needed for landing
* On the desktop
** Ensure Tomboy notes are visible in the Dash
*** Ensure you have Tomboy (package: tomboy) installed
*** Open the Dash and type "tomboy:"
*** Ensure recent Tomboy notes are visible
** Ensure Tomboy notes are searchable
*** Open Tomboy and create a note containing "cat" in its body
*** Open the Dash and type "notes:cat"
*** Ensure that the new note is listed
** Ensure Tomboy notes can be opened from the Dash
*** Open the Dash and type "tomboy:"
*** Click on a note to preview it
*** Ensure that clicking "Edit" opens the note in Tomboy
